languages.text: "По большей мере, но не только. Неужели вы никогда, стоя рядом с ней, не испытывали чистейшего чувства омерзения? Или ярости? Или страха? Кто, как не чудовище, станет манипулировать чувствами и сознанием других? Даже больше, чем это делала Тисифона?"

traits.locale_text: "По большей мере, но не только. Неужели вы никогда, стоя рядом с ней, не испытывали чистейшего чувства омерзения? Или ярости? Или страха? Кто, как не чудовище, станет манипулировать чувтсвами и сознанием других? Даже хуже, чем это делала Тисифона?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"
languages.original_text: "По большей мере, но не только. Неужели вы никогда, стоя рядом с ней, не испытывали чистейшего чувства омерзения? Или ярости? Или страха? Кто, как не чудовище, станет манипулировать чувствами и сознанием других? Даже больше, чем это делала Тисифона?"

traits.locale_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt the pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who if not monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone did?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt the pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who if not monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone did?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “差不多是这样，但原因不止于此。当你站在她身边时，你有没有感到过纯粹的、毫不掩饰的厌恶？或是恐惧？或是愤怒？如果不是怪物，还有谁可以这么操纵别人的思想与感情？甚至比提西福涅操纵得还要厉害？”
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: “差不多是这样，但原因不止于此。当你站在她身边时，你有没有感到过纯粹的、毫不掩饰的厌恶？或是恐惧？或是愤怒？如果不是怪物，还有谁可以这么操纵别人的思想与感情？甚至比提西福涅操纵得还要厉害？”
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «Principalmente, pero hay más. ¿Alguna vez ha sentido un asco puro e incontenible al estar junto a ella? ¿O tal vez furia o miedo? ¿Qué clase de monstruo podría manipular así las mentes y los sentimientos de los demás? Más aún que la propia Tisiphone, además».
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: «Principalmente, pero hay más. ¿Alguna vez ha sentido un asco puro e incontenible al estar junto a ella? ¿O tal vez furia o miedo? ¿Qué clase de monstruo podría manipular así las mentes y los sentimientos de los demás? Más aún que la propia Tisiphone, además».
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「大部分はそうだけど、それだけじゃないわ。彼女の近くに立っていて、純粋な、心からの嫌悪を感じたことはない？あるいは怒りや恐怖を感じたことはない？他人の心や感情を操ることができるものが、怪物以外の何者だというの？ティシフォン自身がそうであったでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: 「大部分はそうだけど、それだけじゃないわ。彼女の近くに立っていて、純粋な、心からの嫌悪を感じたことはない？あるいは怒りや恐怖を感じたことはない？他人の心や感情を操ることができるものが、怪物以外の何者だというの？ティシフォン自身がそうであったでしょう？」
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Ja, hauptsächlich, aber da ist noch mehr. Habt Ihr in ihrer Nähe noch nie pure, unverfälschte Abscheu verspürt? Oder vielleicht Wut oder Angst? Wer außer einem Monster manipuliert den Geist und die Gefühle anderer? Sogar mehr noch als Tisiphone selbst?"
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: "Ja, hauptsächlich, aber da ist noch mehr. Habt Ihr in ihrer Nähe noch nie pure, unverfälschte Abscheu verspürt? Oder vielleicht Wut oder Angst? Wer außer einem Monster manipuliert den Geist und die Gefühle anderer? Sogar mehr noch als Tisiphone selbst?"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « C'est la principale raison, mais pas la seule. Lorsque vous vous tenez près d'elle, vous arrive-t-il de ressentir un profond dégoût ? Ou peut-être même de la rage, ou de la peur ? Et le tout sans raison ? Qui d'autre qu'un monstre pourrait manipuler les esprits et les sentiments d'autrui ? Et avec encore plus de talent que Tisiphone elle-même ? »
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est la principale raison, mais pas la seule. Lorsque vous vous tenez près d'elle, vous arrive-t-il de ressentir un profond dégoût ? Ou peut-être même de la rage, ou de la peur ? Et le tout sans raison ? Qui d'autre qu'un monstre pourrait manipuler les esprits et les sentiments d'autrui ? Et avec encore plus de talent que Tisiphone elle-même ? »
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Büyük oranda evet ancak dahası da var. Ona yakınken hiç saf, dizginlenemeyen bir tiksinti hissetmediniz mi? Öfke veya korku? Başkalarının zihnini ve duygularını manipüle edene canavar denmez de ne denir? Tisiphone'nin kendisinden bile daha canavar!"
languages.original_text: "Largely yes, but there is more. Have you never felt pure, unadulterated disgust while standing close to her? Or perhaps fury, or fear? Who but a monster would manipulate the minds and feelings of others? Even more so than Tisiphone herself did?"

traits.locale_text: "Büyük oranda evet ancak dahası da var. Ona yakınken hiç saf, dizginlenemeyen bir tiksinti hissetmediniz mi? Öfke veya korku veya? Başkalarının zihnini ve duygularını manipüle edene bir canavar denmez de ne denir? Tisiphone'nin kendisinden bile daha fazla hem de!"
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
